Package gobblin.runtime.locks

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    JobLock
    A interface for claiming exclusive right to proceed for each scheduled run of a job.
    JobLockFactory<T extends JobLock>
    A factory for locks keyed on JobSpec .
    JobLockFactoryManager<T extends JobLock,F extends JobLockFactory<T>>
    A factory class for JobLockFactory instances.
    ListenableJobLock  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractJobLockFactoryManager<T extends JobLock,F extends JobLockFactory<T>>
    A default base implementation for JobLockFactoryManager implementations.
    FileBasedJobLock
    An implementation of JobLock that relies on new file creation on a file system.
    FileBasedJobLockFactory
    A factory for file-based job locks.
    FileBasedJobLockFactoryManager
    Manages instances of FileBasedJobLockFactory.
    JobLockEventListener
    The listener for lock events.
    LegacyJobLockFactoryManager
    The factory used to create instances of JobLock.
    ZookeeperBasedJobLock
    An implementation of JobLock that uses Zookeeper.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    JobLockException
    The exception thrown when a JobLock cannot be initialized, acquired, release, etc.
